title: Rhazes Esports
description: A website for an Esports organization that lets users get information about the org's latest news, and upcoming matches.

title: Chatting Website
description: A real-time chatting web app, You can login or create a new account, and You can create/join chatrooms to communicate with your friends

title: Bug Tracker
description: A Bug Tracking website that provides for the users the ability to track their bugs, by creating or joining tables to work with their team on bugs and track the status of those bugs
